descriptions.location: The pale light of the moon casts long shadows on the overgrown lawn of the garden. A cold wind blows and you turn the collar of your coat up against it. There is movement in the bushes at the far end of the garden.

descriptions.detailed: As you approach the bushes, you hear a low growl. Before you can react, a large, shaggy form bursts forth from the hydrangea bushes. You stagger back, your heart pounding in your chest. The creature snarls and begins to shamble towards you.
